name: wifi-icon-visibility
description: Wifi icon should be visible in the ConnMan UI

steps.description: Check that Wifi icon is visible in the technology field

author: zingile

name: wifi-label-visibility
description: Wifi label should be visible in the ConnMan UI

steps.description: Check that Wifi label is visible in the technology field

author: zingile

name: wifi-switch-visibility
description: Wifi switch button should be visible in the ConnMan UI.

steps.description: Check that Wifi switcher is visible

author: zingile

name: wifi-switch-on
description: Wifi connection should be enabled when the Wifi switch button is toggled on 'I'. User should be able to see the available Wifi services.
pre_condition:
- Wifi technology is disabled (Wifi switch button is toggled on 'O' in ConnMan UI and ConnMan extension)
- All the other technology are disabled (Ethernet, Bluetooth, 3G)

steps.description: Click on the Wifi switcher to enable Wifi technology
steps.expected: Wifi switcher of ConnMan UI and ConnMan extension is toggled on 'I'. Wifi icon becomes bold. Available Wifi services appears in the service field. Available Wifi services appear in the ConnMan extension menu

author: zingile

name: wifi-switch-off
description: Wifi connection should be disabled when the Wifi switch button is toggled on 'O'. User should not be able to see the available Wifi services.
pre_condition:
- Wifi technology is enabled (Wifi switch button is toggled on 'I')
- Wifi services of the test AP are configured 
- All other technology are disabled (Wifi, Bluetooth and 3G)

steps.description: Click on the Wifi switcher to disable Wifi technology
steps.expected: Wifi switcher of ConnMan UI and  ConnMan extension is toggled on 'O'. Wifi icon becomes grayed. Service field displays 'No network connection available'. No Wifi service list appears in the ConnMan extension menu

author: zingile
